section:
EarnShardsForCards.Shared.Data.GenericGameObjects.PlayingCardDeck Class Reference EarnShardsForCards.Shared.Data.GenericGameObjects.PlayingCardDeck
A Playing Card Deck represents a real-world deck of cards. It is also used for the draw pile for real-world games. It is created usually with 52 playing cards. Cards can be drawn from it and return as requested. It also randomizes the position of the cards it holds when requested.

Detailed Description
A Playing Card Deck represents a real-world deck of cards. It is also used for the draw pile for real-world games. It is created usually with 52 playing cards. Cards can be drawn from it and return as requested. It also randomizes the position of the cards it holds when requested.
